attributes.additional_details: Kids are being taught about how to reproduce to early. Yes parents have the option to opt out of these sessions. However, if you openly teach a class full of YOUNG kids about reproduction, then they will repeat it to there friends regardless. Kids as young as 8 years old should not know that sperm are kept in the testicles, that eggs are released from a woman's ovarys once a month and in order to make a baby these must meet. I.e penis inside vagina. Protect our children's minds!!
attributes.background: RSHP lessons in Scotland should me made age appropriate for kids. Children are being taught information that they are not mentally, physically or emotionally ready for.

rejection.details:
Your petition is about something that the Scottish Government and Scottish Parliament is responsible for. Education is devolved to Scotland. That means that the UK Government and Parliament can't look into it. 

The Scottish Parliament has its own Public Petitions Committee. If you'd like to send your petition to the Scottish Parliament, you can find out more here: https://petitions.parliament.scot/
